    Mike Monteiro’s Design Is A Job

    I was pleased to find a copy of Mike Monteiro’s Design Is A Job on my desk after returning from our 4 day vacation in the Okanagan. If this book is anything like Mike’s Creative Mornings talk Fuck You. Pay Me, I am going to enjoy reading this. Working at Steamclock Software is awesome!
